description: Product Description Frozen themed dance mat - sure to be the hit of any party! Get your kids moving in a fun way and keep them away from TV and video games. This is an ideal toy gift for children, especially those who love to dance or move. EVERY KID AT THE PARTY WILL BE QUEUING UP TO GET ON! Game for all ages - 5 levels of difficulty gradually increasing from easy to hard Soft padded, non-slip and touch sensitive dance pads Light-up indicator on screen shows your next move Dance along to 9 built-in songs , never get bored Endless fun - with 7 challenging game modes Adjustable volume - set to near silent or party level loud High quality parts and strong construction for durability Easy to clean - playmat surface made of waterproof material Safety - passed CPSIA & ASTM standard tests Key Features of the SUNLIN Frozen Theme Dancing Challenge Playmat What are the benefits of the SUNLIN Frozen Theme Dancing Challenge Playmat? An ideal gift for children - Looking for the perfect birthday/graduation/christmas gift for that special little girl in your life? This dancing playmat is just what you want! Built-in music & piano mode - 9 built-in music tracks to choose from. Piano mode lets kids play 9 different piano notes to create their first song in life! Enhanced parent-child Interaction - Kids may need to work with their parents to get a better score on higher difficulty levels. It turns out to be a great game to increase family interaction and fun. Coordination and cooperation - The dance game encourages physical activity, just keep up with the light! Kids will learn how to work with others to complete the level as they attempt the higher difficulty levels. A new way to exercise - The SUNLIN PLAYMAT will be an addictive new dance game for boys and girls that will keep your kids away from TV and video games. A home fitness gadget - It's a fun way to exercise indoors, especially when it's getting colder/hotter outside and the kids just want to stay indoors. Dance anytime & anywhere - The dance mat takes up little space and folds up easily for storage. Fits perfectly in your suitcase when travelling. What else are customers interested in? FROZEN ELEMENTS Featuring the most popular elements and characters , this dance mat is sure to be the hit of any party ! Buy this for your child and you'll never hear the words "I'm bored! EASY STORAGE & NON-SLIP Folds up easily for storage. Fits perfectly into a rucksack. The non-slip pattern on the back provides stability when children are playing. BATTERY POWERED Powered by 3 x AA batteries (NOT INCLUDED) . Do not mix alkaline, regular or rechargeable batteries. Do not mix old and new batteries. WATERPROOF SURFACE No more cleaning worries! All you need is a damp cloth and your dance mat is as good as new! 1.8m Piano Mat Dancing Challenge Playmat Buying Options Buying Options Customer Reviews 4.5 out of 5 stars 438 4.4 out of 5 stars 6,481 Price Â£39.99 Â£ 39 . 99 Â£29.99 Â£ 29 . 99 Size 181CMÃ—74CM 93CMÃ—90CM Volume Control âœ“ âœ“ Batteries Required 4Ã—AA (NOT INCLUDED) 3Ã—AA (NOT INCLUDED) Easy Storage Foldable Foldable Easy Clean âœ“ âœ“
